Tagline:A timeless story of 
innocence lost and humanity found. 

Plot:
Set during World War II, a story seen through the innocent 
eyes of Bruno, the eight-year-old son of the commandant 
at a concentration camp, whose forbidden friendship with 
a Jewish boy on the other side of the camp fence has 
startling and unexpected consequences.
